mapper.select:
SELECT travel_no ,title ,main_img_nm ,main_img_path FROM travel_info WHERE 1=1
AND hashtag = #{hashtag}
AND addr01 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gugun},'%')
AND addr01 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sido},'%')
ORDER BY travel_no DESC

SELECT travel_no,title ,fd_no_1,fd_no_2,fd_no_3,fd_no_4,fd_no_5 ,fd_no_6,fd_no_7,fd_no_8,fd_no_9,fd_no_10 ,fd_nm_1,fd_nm_2,fd_nm_3,fd_nm_4,fd_nm_5 ,fd_nm_6,fd_nm_7,fd_nm_8,fd_nm_9,fd_nm_10
FROM travel_info WHERE fd_yn = "Y" AND (fd_nm_1 != '' OR fd_nm_2 != '' OR fd_nm_3 != '' OR fd_nm_4 != '' OR fd_nm_5 != '' OR fd_nm_6 != '' OR fd_nm_7 != '' OR fd_nm_8 != '' OR fd_nm_9 != '' OR fd_nm_10 != '' ) ORDER BY travel_no DESC
mapper.update: DELETE FROM food_info WHERE travel_no = #{travel_no} AND food_no = #{food_no}
